message: I propose a fair split, 90% for me, 10% for you. Let's get this over with quickly!
You're being greedy, let's try a more balanced split!
Let's be reasonable. I'm taking a big hit from inflation, so 60/40 is the fairest split right now.  Accept this and we can both walk away with something.
You're still being too aggressive, let's meet in the middle!
I've adjusted my offer to be more equitable. Let's split the money evenly.  This is the last chance to get something before inflation takes more of our winnings.
